name: zendesk

metadata.description:
zendesk


Creates zendesk tickets.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed

Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • message: Message provided with the ticket
  • subject: Subject of the ticket
  • ZENDESK_USER: Zendesk user (email)
  • ZENDESK_KEY: Zendesk API token (more info)
  • ZENDESK_DOMAIN: E.g.: 'waylayhelp' is the domain for waylay support
  • requester: Requester of the ticket
